bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and Apparatus for Custom Strategy Specification in a Hosted Electronic Transaction Service System

abstract.p: A merchant generates a customized service strategy related to a suite of electronic transaction services hosted by a service provider. The custom strategy specifies services to perform, and possibly an order in which to perform the services, by a service provider in relation to an electronic transaction associated with the merchant. Through use of a user interface, the strategy can be represented as a graphical decision tree, with terminal nodes representing services or actions. A customized strategy is transmitted to a service provider, as is transaction related information, whereby the service provider can service the transaction according to the strategy and based on the transaction information. Scheduling information that specifies different strategies to apply to different transaction scenarios can be generated. A strategy is selected by a service provider based on the scheduling information and transaction information, and is used to service one or more electronic transactions.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: CUSTOM STRATEGY SPECIFICATION IN A HOSTED ELECTRONIC TRANSACTION SERVICE SYSTEM

abstract.p: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a mechanism for controlling or customizing service strategy related to a hosted electronic transaction service system from a remote place simply.

SOLUTION: A merchant generates a customized service strategy related to a suite of electronic transaction services hosted by a service provider, by being represented as a graphical decision tree, and the strategy is transmitted to a service provider. The service provider can service the transaction according to the strategy and based on the transaction information. Scheduling information that specifies different strategies to apply to different transaction scenarios can be generated. A strategy is selected by a service provider based on the scheduling information and transaction information, and is used to service one or more electronic transactions.
COPYRIGHT: (C)2011,JPO&INPIT

bibliographic-data.invention-title: CUSTOM STRATEGY SPECIFICATION IN A HOSTED ELECTRONIC TRANSACTION SERVICE SYSTEM
SPECIFICATION DE STRATEGIE PERSONNALISEE DANS UN SYSTEME DE SERVICES DE TRANSACTIONS ELECTRONIQUES HEBERGE

abstract.p: A merchant generates a customized service strategy related to a suite of electronic transaction services hosted by a service provider. The custom strategy specifies services to perform, and possibly an order in which to perform the services, by a service provider in relation to an electronic transaction associated with the merchant. Through use of a user interface, the strategy can be represented as a graphical decision tree, with terminal nodes representing services or actions. A customized strategy is transmitted to a service provider, as is transaction related information, whereby the service provider can service the transaction according to the strategy and based on the transaction information. Scheduling information that specifies different strategies to apply to different transaction scenarios can be generated.
A strategy is selected by a service provider based on the scheduling information and transaction information, and is used to service one or more electronic transactions.

Un vendeur produit une stratégie de services personnalisée relative à une suite de services de transactions électroniques hébergés par un fournisseur de services. La stratégie personnalisée spécifie les services devant être effectués, et éventuellement un ordre dans lequel effectuer ces services, par un fournisseur de services en relation à une transaction électronique associée au vendeur. L'utilisation d'une interface d'utilisateur permet la représentation de la stratégie en tant qu'arbre de décision graphique, les noeuds terminaux représentant des services ou des actions. Une stratégie personnalisée est transmise à un fournisseur de services, en tant qu'informations relatives à la transaction, le fournisseur de services pouvant mettre en oeuvre la transaction selon la stratégie et sur la base des informations relatives à la transaction.

Des informations d'ordonnancement qui spécifient les différentes stratégies à appliquer à différents scénarios de transactions peuvent être produites. Une stratégie est sélectionnée par un fournisseur de services sur la base des informations d'ordonnancement et des informations de transaction, et est utilisée pour mettre en oeuvre une ou plusieurs transactions électroniques.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: CUSTOM STRATEGY SPECIFICATION IN A HOSTED ELECTRONIC TRANSACTION SERVICE SYSTEM
SPECIFICATION DE STRATEGIE PERSONNALISEE DANS UN SYSTEME DE SERVICES DE TRANSACTIONS ELECTRONIQUES HEBERGE

Scheduling information that specifies different strategies to apply to different transaction scenarios can be generated.
A strategy is selected by a service provider based on the scheduling information and transaction information, and is used to service one or more electronic transactions.
